Image Manipulation Module
===================================================

This `module <https://github.com/OlivierNDO/indoor_object_detection/blob/master/src/image_manipulation.py>`_ houses functions and classes used in manipulating images and their numpy arrays.

The source module with all importable scripts is located `here <https://github.com/OlivierNDO/indoor_object_detection/blob/master/src/>`_.

.. automodule:: src.image_manipulation
   :members:
   :special-members:
